name: Super Strike Trilogy
overview: Super Strike Trilogy is an unreleased video game compilation for the Sega CD console. Super Strike Trilogy was announced at the 1995 Electronic Entertainment Expo and was meant to include enhanced editions of Electronic Arts' first three Strike games, Desert Strike, Jungle Strike and Urban Strike, potentially with extra content removed from their original cartridge releases due to space constraints. The disc was however cancelled for unknown reasons. A prototype featuring the complete beta version of the game was dumped and released on the internet in July 2017.
